text: Val Terbi is a municipality in Delémont in the canton of Jura in Switzerland. ==History== The municipality was created on January 1, 2013 by merger of the former municipalities of Montsevelier, Vermes and Vicques. On 1 January 2018, the former municipality of Corban merged into the municipality of Val Terbi. ==Gallery== File:Montsevelier 303.JPG|Montsevelier File:Vicques 385.JPG|Vicques File:Vermes rivereto Gabiare 258.JPG|Vermes File:Corban 284.JPG|Corban ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Municipalities in Delémont Category:2013 establishments in Switzerland
title: Val Terbi
